attributes.action: resign and appoint Gok Wan (from TV series How to Look Good Naked) Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gok Wan, as the most unerringly positive person in the country, is the only person who can steer this great country out of recession.  With a clever blend of feel-good comments and the widespread use of Spanx, Gok will be able to make the upcoming tough economic choices seem all lovely and flattering.  Gok for Prime Minister!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
